alert.note: Alert for Coachella Valley; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Frost Advisory issued January 12 at 4:16AM PST until January 12 at 8:00AM PST by NWS SanDiego
info.description: ...FROST ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM PST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Temperatures from 28 to 35 degrees in wind sheltered valleys will result in frost formation. * WHERE...The Inland Empire, San Diego County Valleys, the Coachella Valley, and the San Diego County Deserts. * WHEN...Through 8 AM Friday. * IMPACTS...Frost could kill sensitive outdoor vegetation and plants if left uncovered. Pets should be brought indoors. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Areas of frost are likely again tonight into Saturday morning.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold.

area.areaDesc: Coachella Valley; San Bernardino and Riverside County Valleys-The Inland Empire; San Diego County Deserts; San Diego County Inland Valleys
